assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome_For_DeNovo_Initial_Initiation_Criteria_Q1
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Requires a confirmed diagnosis of aHUS with active TMA without another cause AND a trial of plasma exchange AND the presence of organ dysfunction. All of criteria 1, 2, 3 and 4 must be met. Approval is for 6 months
